content: As an AI language model, I am not aware of the specific area you are in, but you can search for seafood restaurants near your location or ask the hostel staff for their recommendations. You can also use restaurant review websites like Yelp or TripAdvisor to look for the top-rated seafood restaurants and filtered by your preference, either the best in the area, price range that suits you, or cuisine style. Additionally, if you are in a coastal area, visiting a seafood market can be an exciting experience as you can witness the fresh catch and select what you want to eat.
